meanings.definition: A virtual space on the internet where users can communicate with each other in real-time.
meanings.sent1: In the chatroom, people from different places talk to each other online.
meanings.sent2: I joined a chatroom to discuss my favorite TV show with other fans.
meanings.sent3: The chatroom was so busy that it felt like a digital party!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a chatroom buzzing with ideas and conversations.
meanings.sent5: The chatroom was like a bustling marketplace of thoughts and words.

meanings.definition: The act of engaging in conversation with others in a chatroom.
meanings.sent1: Participating in a chatroom can be a fun way to meet new people.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys the chatroom experience because she can share her thoughts with others.
meanings.sent3: Their chatroom banter was filled with jokes and laughter.
meanings.sent4: The chatroom conversations flowed like a digital river of words.
meanings.sent5: Engaging in the chatroom discussions made her feel connected to a larger community.
